CustomField.description: The percentage of bookings that are already ready-to-bill, including any pre-billed amount.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( pse__Bookings__c = 0.00, ISBLANK( pse__Bookings__c ) , pse__Apply_Billing_Cap__c = false) , null, (pse__Billings__c + BLANKVALUE(pse__Pre_Billed__c, 0)) / pse__Bookings__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The percentage of bookings that are already ready-to-bill, including any pre-billed amount.
CustomField.label: Percentage Used
